label: Total confirmed cases of Covid-19
description: The cumulative total of confirmed Covid-19 cases. Confirmed cases include presumptive positive cases and probable cases, in accordance with CDC guidelines as of April 14.
reference: Dong, E., Du, H., & Gardner, L. (2020). An interactive web-based dashboard to track COVID-19 in real time. The Lancet, 20(5), 533–534. https://doi.org/10.1016/S1473-3099(20)30120-1
notes: China includes Hong Kong; Denmark includes Greenland; France includes overseas territories; Netherlands includes overseas territories; United Kingdom includes overseas territories

label: Total deaths from Covid-19
description: The cumulative total of deaths from Covid-19. Death totals in the US include confirmed and probable, in accordance with CDC guidelines as of April 14.
reference: Dong, E., Du, H., & Gardner, L. (2020). An interactive web-based dashboard to track COVID-19 in real time. The Lancet, 20(5), 533–534. https://doi.org/10.1016/S1473-3099(20)30120-1
notes: China includes Hong Kong; Denmark includes Greenland; France includes overseas territories; Netherlands includes overseas territories; United Kingdom includes overseas territories

label: Total recoveries from Covid-19
description: The cumulative total of recoveries from Covid-19. Recovered cases outside China are estimates based on local media reports, and state and local reporting when available, and therefore may be substantially lower than the true number.
reference: Dong, E., Du, H., & Gardner, L. (2020). An interactive web-based dashboard to track COVID-19 in real time. The Lancet, 20(5), 533–534. https://doi.org/10.1016/S1473-3099(20)30120-1
notes: China includes Hong Kong; Denmark includes Greenland; France includes overseas territories; Netherlands includes overseas territories; United Kingdom includes overseas territories
